Name: COC
Upload COC here and press PASS
Pour Checklist
Blockwork Setout/Pre Start QA
Grids available for reference and base of wall marked accurately
RL reference/TOW confirmed
Starter bars correct (location, length and strength)
Concrete/footing clean, tidy and level (ready for first course)
Blockwork reinforcing steel delivered correct and accessible (attach photos of respective reinforcing docket)
Any additional pre start observations
Approval given to start laying blockwork
Blockwall Prepour
Base of wall in correct location
Horizontal reinforcing installed correctly (centres/size/splicing etc)
Ties/Control joints installed as required
Vertical reinforcing installed as required with appropriate splice
Openings checked and correct - location, height and width
Washouts correct/openings covered correctly and wall braced adequately (if required)
Any additional observations/inspections attached
Wall built within tolerance - straight, level and to the correct height (Approval to pour)
Blockwall Pour
Any remedial work completed/observations closed out and approval given to pour
Concrete specifications checked and correct - delivery docket(s) photographed
General photos and any additional observations
All blocks filled to correct height
Starter bars in centre of block (if applicable)
Any concrete spillage/splatter cleaned up
Blockwork wall(s) complete to required specification
